description:

noun

verb

verb: licht; 3rd person present: lichts; past tense: lichted; past participle: lichted; gerund or present participle: lichting

Scottish form of light1 (verb).

LICHT+ is a letter based Tetris like block drop game for the Playdate.
I thought I'd go for a simpler game for my second game and go for a twist on the game of Tetris.

Everything was going well until I tested on a real device. Word of warning a Playdate cannot handle it, if you draw everything with drawLine and drawRect so I had to make some modifications to get it running at full speed.

I can add a classic version to this game if I get enough comments asking for it.

Controls:
 - UP or A button to rotate.
- Left or right to move.
- Hold left, right or down to move the pieces faster.
